lines: A long-time friend and confidant tells you that she is worried that her husband is fooling around with another woman. You have known the two of them for quite some time and don't THINK her husband would do something like that, but you

Not long after she tells you this, you happen to see her husband walking arm-in-arm with a beautiful young woman.
You try very hard to ignore it, but all you can think of is your friend, whose heart is being torn apart by that little home-wrecker.
#PUT IT OUT OF YOUR MIND COMPLETELY
You were wise not to meddle in the affairs (no pun intended) of others. Your friend soon finds out about her husband's tryst and throws him out!

Couldn't resist poking your nose into other people's business, could you? After revealing what you saw, your friend confronts her husband and throws him out of the house. Not soon after, the husband presents an airtight alibi which
exonerates HIM and identifies YOU as a meddler.
He doesn't know what you are talking about. On the day you claim to have seen him, he was out of town on business -- and his wife was with him! "BUTT OUT!" he says.

Soon after this, you notice her husband walking arm-in-arm with a beautiful woman 15 years his junior.
She doesn't believe she is paranoid; she thinks she is justifiably worried. Your comment is perceived as insensitive, but maybe that is really how you feel about the matter.
About a week later, you see her husband walking arm-in-arm with a beautiful woman 15 years his junior.

Oddly enough, about a week later you notice a peculiar hair on the love of your life's jacket sleeve. His shirt collar also smells like perfume...
